name: iOS iMovie Trailer
summary: Learn about .IMOVIETRAILER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The iOS version of iMovie allows you to create various types of video projects and save them as .IMOVIEMOBILE files. However, if you create a trailer, the app saves it as an IMOVIETRAILER file.
To create an IMOVIETRAILER file with the iOS version of iMovie:
IMOVEITRAILER files are compressed with Zip-compression and store various files and folders, including:
An "Assets" folder that stores individual .MOV video clips that make up the trailer.
One or more .PLIST files that store settings, such as the trailer name, duration, and theme.
A "Movies" folder that stores the trailer MOV video.

description: An IMOVIETRAILER file stores a trailer created by the iOS version of Apple iMovie, a video-editing application. It may contain one or more video clips, titles, transitions, and settings. iMovie users save videos as IMOVIETRAILER files when creating Hollywood-style movie trailers from templates packaged with iMovie.

instructions: You can open an IMOVIETRAILER file with Apple iMovie on a Mac or iOS device. For example, to open an IMOVIETRAILER file with iMovie on a Mac, select File â†’Import iMovie iOS Projects.

Since IMOVIETRAILER files are compressed with Zip compression, you can extract their contents with a Zip compression utility, such as Microsoft File Explorer (Windows) or Apple Archive Utility (macOS). You may need to rename the .iMovieTrailer file extension to .zip before extracting the contents with a Zip utility.
